org.nise.ux.asl.run

Class ServiceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nise.ux.asl.run.ServiceClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class ServiceClient
extends Object
implements Closeable
    This is the Main Constructor Class of this service library.
    To use this library create an instance of this class, then use #create() to start the service
    Example:
       ServiceClient client = new ServiceClient(host, port, concurrency);
       TypeToken<ReturnObject> type4Return = new TypeToken<ReturnObject>() {
       };
       ReturnObject response = client.invokeServiceCommand(type4Return, "example", input);

    OR

       ServiceClient client = new ServiceClient(host, port, concurrency);
       ReturnObject response = client.invokeServiceCommand(ReturnObject.class, "example", input);
    Author:
    Yaser Eftekhari ( ^ - ^ )
    See Also:
    ServiceServerBuilder, WorkerFactory, Worker, MapCommand, CommandChain

        public <RD> RD invokeServiceCommand(com.google.gson.reflect.TypeToken<RD> type4Return,
                           String command,
                           Object... data)
                        throws ServiceException,
                               IOException
        invokes Command mapped on server-side function and returns the result, or the Exception/Error that has occurred.
        Parameters:
        type4Return - Type of Object to be returned
        command - server-side command
        data - input arguments
        Returns:
        server-side service return object
        Throws:
        ServiceException - The Exception/Error that has occurred during execution of service.
        IOException - Occurs when Connection to server is dropped or lost.
